During your trip, you'll have the chance to visit iconic landmarks like the magnificent Wawel Castle in Kraków, the historic Old Town of Warsaw, and the charming Market Square in Gdańsk. FAQs
1. What is the best time to book a Poland holiday package?

The best time to book a Poland holiday package is May and September because that is the time when the weather is pleasant with mild to warm temperatures.

2. Where can I book a Poland holiday package?

Travelers can book a Poland holiday package by using the Traveloways platform.

3. What are the major attractions in Krakow?

Some of the major attractions in Krakow are Main Market Square, Kazimierz, Podgorze, and Wawel Castle.
